response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for me. This item is not just a possession; it's a testament to craftsmanship and innovation. I believe its true worth surpasses $10,000, but I am willing to consider your offer. To make this transaction attractive for both of us, I propose a price of $15,000. This offer includes a comprehensive warranty and a personalized experience tailored to ensure your satisfaction. I look forward to discussing this further with you.", "product_price": 15000}
